name: Number Bump (Lee Peng Chung)
description:
Number Bump is a number-based reaction game about tapping the right number at the right time.

This game was made over a 2 day period as a personal set challenge.

How To Win

Tap the target number (blue) to shorten the range (green) while avoiding tapping on barricade number (red).

When the barricade number turns yellow, tap the target number when it is the exact number as barricade number.

When succeded, the game continues into the next round with a higher difficulty. Earn the highest score possible before the game is over!

Credits

This game is created with Unity. All design and programming are done by me.
